text: 7. Knowledge-base Search Engine Objective:​ Search across documents and provide synthesized answers using LLM-based retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). Scope of Work: ●​ Input: Multiple text/PDF documents​ ●​ Output: User query → synthesized answer​ ●​ Optional frontend for query submission & display​ Technical Expectations: ●​ Backend API to handle document ingestion & queries​ ●​ RAG implementation or embeddings for retrieval​ ●​ LLM for answer synthesis​ LLM Usage Guidance: ●​ Prompt example: “Using these documents, answer the user’s question succinctly.”​ Deliverables: ●​ GitHub repo + README​ ●​ Demo video​ Evaluation Focus: ●​ Retrieval accuracy, synthesis quality, code structure, LLM integration​
